name: Eatrite
description: EatRite, a part of Susiko Bakers, is working to promote (healthier) rice flour products - which includes local delicacies like milk toffees and kawung.
tip:
They sell string hoppers throughout the day, they also have a branch in Maligawatte.
Pani Kadju, Milk Toffees and Bombay Sweets are delicious!
